website_summaries.verdict: An affordable organizer option that has the added bonus of storage pockets.
pros: Users appreciate that this model is breathable, an ample size, and is easy to put up and use
It also stands out for the organizer pockets to separate toys or to use for bath products
Most felt the suction and instructions were good
cons: A few had problems with the suction cups
Some noted the organizer tended to stay damp

customer_reviews.title: Best bath toy organizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is there plenty of room for 6 rubber animals, complete foam alphabet and 10-digit numbers, and other random toys, this organizer actually sticks to the wall! I used windex on the wall just like the instructions explained, turned the hook, and voila! They stuck to a wall that's not exactly a flat surface. Also, I love this toy bag because it leaves corner tub space available for shampoo,mconditioner, and soap bottles. In my house, that extra space is priceless! Don't look any further than this product. It is AWESOME,
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this!!!! I've purchased two other items similar to this at my local Babies R Us but they never actually stay on the wall or hold all of his bath toys. This product is by far the best thing I've spent money on in awhile. It keeps my sons toys all organized and up out of the way. Updated review, my husband and I love this thing so much we had to purchase one for our stuff too! They save so much room compared to those big bulky metal ones!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the organizer and EXCELLENT customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the original. It came with 2 of the suction cups welded together. I contacted the company and got an immediate response. Kristin was so helpful and for my troubles she sent me a whole new organizer and upgraded me to the deluxe for free. This is excellent customer service! I also LOVE the organizer. It fits all the shampoo and body wash bottles perfect and the toys. The deluxe comes with an additional large single pocket toy bag that I just don't need right now. The bag seems very sturdy and the suction cups are very strong. Just received the other day so can't review it's long term durability. Will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Cambria

customer_reviews.title: Total Dissatisfaction with Accompanied Embarrassment
customer_reviews.text: If I could’ve chosen no stars I would have. I distinctly selected the options in the pink box that comes with the alphabet, numbers and assorted toys. Today my two year old grandson received an empty net much to my sorrow, horror, embarrassment and anger. Of course he cried. In sending this as a gift in great distance, how does one expect his parent to assume the responsibility and cost of returning it? Just so disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Stop researching & buy this one: claim your shower space back! 5 stars & would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research, this was purchased and has hung in my shower for four months. Pros: The included hooks are excellent - my strong 2 year old cannot pull it down. Its very breathable and I haven't had any mold issues or reasons to clean it yet. The extra hooks are a nice bonus - I hung my son's oversized bath toys without problems. The included instructions were very helpful. Now my son has a place to store and help clean up his bath toys. Cons: check the sizing - it does take up a lot of space on the wall. Pockets at top are small.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for a time, while it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Edited review:: the hooks fell off the stickers so it took me forever to get the stickers off the wall. I tried to use the hooks without the stickers like we did for the loofas but the bag for storage weighs them down too much. So now we have a bag of toys on the ground. So the point doesn’t even matter now because it can’t hang. So it was convenient while it lasted. Now it’s pointless. Great product, excited to fill up. The extra hooks are also super useful. I have four kids who love bathtime so this definitely will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. Maybe I am crazy but I am pretty sure this came with four hooks (as pictured) but only two sticky things that actually stick the hooks on the wall. I am sad about this. I am so excited about this because I want the toys to dry between uses. Update: I was so pleased to receive four stickies in the mail today from the seller. What great customer service!!! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: There has to be better toy organizers out there.
customer_reviews.text: The reason for the 1 ☆ is the sticky things lasted 2 weeks maybe. So my daughter doesn't look as happy as the kid in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I have bought so many similar products promising strong suction but all of them continually would fall and be on the floor of the tub by morning but this thing is a beast! I couldn't tell you how this thing holds so well with all the massive toys stored inside.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Even better company!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mesh bag! It is a great size and holds all our bath toys and soaps. I highly recommend this product as it comes from a great company that cares about its consumers! They sent me some sticky tabs to place under the suction cups for a stronger hold! I'm thinking of putting one in my shower as well since my husband and I fight for the tiny space that holds our bottles! Thanks Varela Company for your dedication and support!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisY

customer_reviews.title: Definitely what we needed for tub toy storage
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on getting this toy organizer as some of the reviews commented about the suctions cup quality. Then I thought well...if that is the only issue I can always get stronger ones if needed. Well, they weren't needed. These suction cups hold everything just fine. They haven't even moved!! We have body wash, shampoo and condition in them along with all the kid toys. It hasn't fallen once, even with the kids pulling on it, and we've had it up about a month now. The size is great and can hold so much!! Definitely recommend and love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica George

customer_reviews.title: Stays great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer. I had a pelican one that hung over the side of the tub that didn't work well at all, so I got this one to replace it. It stays up on the wall really well, comes with extra hooks for hanging a body pouf or something (although we don't use them), and has a large enough pocket to hold even our bulky toys. The capacity isn't huge (the old one held more), but it keeps our collection of bath toys at a reasonable level!
customer_reviews.author: J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Most practical and large bath toy organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this bath toy organizer at a cousin’s house and knew right away I had to have it for our toddler. Here’s why you should buy this one: 1) suction is super powerful and have never had any issues with it falling- we have had this organizer for over a year. 2) it’s a considerable size. Lots of toys will fit if you want them to as well as bottles of shampoo and body wash. 3) my top reason- it’s practical and takes up the least amount of space when compared to tower tub toy organizers because of the fact that you can hang it!
customer_reviews.author: MssyNorX

customer_reviews.title: I am so impressed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look I need to take a picture of this toy cubby and show ya'll how awesome it is! It holds all our ABC's and 123's and also all of our boats and little water toys PLUS our duckies! Then the top cubbies will hold our shampoo and conditioner and the baby wash! I also hang my back scrub brush and foot pumice on the hangers with the suctions that the cubby hangs on as well. It looks super stylish and very classy in my bathrooms bathtub! I LOVE THIS THING! Do not hesitate to buy it ya'll, just buy it! P.s they even threw in a cute little squeaky duck in there that my 1 year old LOVES!
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Not mold resistent
customer_reviews.text: This started getting mold on it in under 2 weeks, and the suction cups do not stay suctioned for more than a week too. The size is good though, and we like the smaller pockets in addition to the big one.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups work great and it holds weight well Edit: originally bought this 8/2016 and as of today 4/26/17, we are still happy with this. Downside though is we've gone through the extra hooks it comes with. They're very cheap and break so easy. It has a flimsy plastic peg to keep it "secure" in the middle. We have not been rough with them, just sliding them around the walls of the tub to find the perfect spot and they've broken. Besides that, it holds a good amount of toys and just recently got the first bleaching since the bottom was starting to change colors. Highly recommend but do find better hooks!!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Neely

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: No matter what we have done, short of super glue, this will not stay up We have tile backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Sarhan

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you used the adhesive hooks.
customer_reviews.text: I hated that my kids bath toys were always left in the tub. It was annoying when we had guests over to pull them all out so they wouldn't be in the way. I got this thinking it would be a good solution and it works great!! We did try the suction cups first but they didn't work well with the tile in our bathroom. I am sure for some tiles they may work better. Since we changed to the adhesive tabs we have had no problems! It holds all their toys, body washes, shampoos and cups to rinse off perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KDuncan

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first month. I bleached it weekly but the mold kept growing. I had to throw out all the toys. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Krissy1

customer_reviews.title: Suction is useless but still great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to hold and dry out bath toys. Just as the other reviews say, the suction holders are useless. Kept causing the net to fall into the tub. I was worried about it falling on the kids so simple fix was to use a couple of hooks into the wall of the shower (right beneath the showerhead) so it still hangs and drains into the tub. Much more secure and I don't have to remove the hooks when I want to wash it--just take the net down and put it back easily.
customer_reviews.author: MellowFace

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic outdoor pool toy storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic use for outdoor, above ground pool. I used the adhesive tabs (suction cups would not work on the texture) for the side of our vinyl pool, to store small toys. We’ve used for about a month in the blazing sun and have had no issues with adhesion. I’m guessing the weight of the toys are around 10 pounds. My only suggestion is to add a larger size option.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for something to replace our existing bath shelves that would every so often fall off the shower stall wall due to suction weakness. I am so glad to have found this nifty bath organizer. It consolidates our scrub brushes, sponges and razors in such a tidy way. Aesthetically it looks much better in comparison to our old system of piling them on a shelf. Another plus is the light weight but strong netting allows faster drying time for wet items placed in the organizer. I am impressed how strong and secure the suction hooks are. It also comes with a set of 2 adhesive hooks for porous or non-smooth surfaces. Hooray! No more falling shelves!
customer_reviews.author: M. T. DDS

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this bath toy organizer. It really does do it job of holding up. I’ve owned different bath toy organizers and they would just fall off. The suction cups are very powerful. I even used the extra ones to hold my baby bath tub up. And let me tell You it’s so strong it holds it up. I’ve previously used command strips that supposedly held up to 16 pounds and the tub isn’t even close to being 16 pounds but the command strips would un stick within a few hours of holding the tub. Not these suction cups though, it’s been a few days and they’re still holding my baby tub up! I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jsvargas13

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for about 4 months now. This works great with our particular bathtub set up and my kids have an easy time seeing their toys and accessing them, even my youngest, who is 18-months old. Toys are able to drain and dry sufficiently. There is no odor or moisture remaining. The hooks have had no problem sticking to the wall, and have not fallen or come loose in any way so far. To top it off, the color isn’t obnoxious in our bathroom—5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, even overloaded with toys
customer_reviews.text: My kids' bathroom was getting to resemble a bath toy store, and though we previously used a laundry basket to hold the My Little Ponies and Barbies that my daughter uses for bath toys, I was eager to find something that held quite a few things, but that I didn't have to haul in and out of the tub every time they need to take a bath. This tub cubby stuck to the wall very easily, and it holds a ton of stuff! The bathroom looks much neater, for which I am very grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Quack

customer_reviews.title: Handy but NOT mold resistant!
customer_reviews.text: This toy mesh organizer is very handy. It's easy to throw my kiddo's toys into it after having a bath. HOWEVER, the description states "mold resistant". It isn't mold resistant! We've had our organizer for about 3 months & it's starting to stink & grow green mold.
customer_reviews.author: Bhink3120

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but suction components don't last
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it but now not so much. The suction was good for a short period of time and it really was a great idea in terms of keeping all bath toys organized BUT the suction components don't work anymore and on top of that, the pouches get moldy. I am not sure if this is machine washable and if it was, that would solve the issue with the mold but not the suction components. Will be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Best shower toy caddy!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *Incredible suction power! (I have a tiled shower and this works very well. I have not had to touch the suction cups since I installed it, which is a far cry from the other one we had (different company). *It holds A LOT of toys, shampoo, and other things, as you can see from the photo I attached. *Easy to clean!! Cons: None!! Note: If you found this review to be helpful, please indicate that by clicking the appropriate button below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CollegeGrad08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Big tub organizer that stays on my shower wall!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller tub organizer before this one and it would never stay up on my shower wall. This tub organizer is huge and I’ve had no problems with the suction cups falling off or down. The company sends extra adhesive hooks if the suction cups don’t stay on your shower wall but I haven’t even had to use them. It was very easy to set up and I love this organizer. I would definitely purchase it again. I highly recommend this and the seller/company also seems great!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Yay! I found a great bath toy holder! I did a lot of research to find the right one. I decided to try this after reading reviews. It’s been awesome so far. No mold and holds a lot of toys plus has holders for soaps and bubbles! Great purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Steph01

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for the included adhesive hooks!
customer_reviews.text: So I took a star away because nothing I tried would keep the suction cups on the tiles. Or any surface I tried attaching them to. They would seem to be holding strong, but the next time I came into the room, they had popped off. Thank goodness for the adhesive ones that were included. They are holding nice and strong. Ample storage for his toys and baby products. Also, my little guy loves the tiny rubber ducky that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick; less than a month
customer_reviews.text: So, I received it on August 15th and it's been a little less than a month that we've had it up. We have textured tiles in our shower, so I followed directions and used the adhesive hooks. Being in the shower today, the right hook was only sticking partially on the wall and I needed to remove it because it no longer fully sticks. What a hassle and disappointment it would be to return it, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Succulents

customer_reviews.title: Holds all toys...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product but will not be ordering again if the mold happens again. It holds ALL of my sons bath toys and is suitable for the bath tub. BUT... This is the second one I've purchased because the mold would NOT come off even with soaking and washing. The suction cup does NOT hold in our shower so we have to use the adhesive which did not even come with the first purchase, so I didn't know they even existed.
customer_reviews.author: Alisyn C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. It hold very well. I put so many bath toys in it. It never fell apart once. Easy to stick on the wall. It came with 4 extra clear hangers. I would ignore the review if I didn’t see the greeting letter from the company and ask to review to help the small business succeed along with 25% off discount card for their bath towel. They also sent me a message when the package delivered, and the tips how to set it up. I am very satisfied not only with the products but also the their company customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Justin& Palmy

customer_reviews.title: Hooks pop off wall
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing all the positive reviews and figured it had to be good. We have a slick, standard shower lining. I followed the directions and thought we had a good fit. Loaded it up with 1/4 as much as the image shows. Not very much weight at all. I left the room, then heard a small thud. Came back in to see the hooks had popped off the wall. I tried a few more times before giving up.
customer_reviews.author: tamethetime

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We've had others but none held up like this one. It easily holds all the toys and stays in place. Other reviews suggested the original would he big enough and they are correct. And yes,it does hold the shower beer too lol. We were very happy with this purchase. Now my child easily cleans up after his bath. No more stepping on hot wheels when I get in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Clark

customer_reviews.title: Mesh bag is good, the hooks are not.
customer_reviews.text: The actually mesh bag has held up well even after it was thrown in the washer a few times. The hooks however, have not held up. Both hooks are held together by a small plastic piece and both hooks had that piece fall away and get lost within a few months. Since the mesh bag held up I just kept that and used command hooks. Annoying. The suction cups held to the tile walls very well. However they are unusable if the hooks aren't there.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Arcos

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Company is responsive!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tub cubby! The only reason I gave it a 4/5 stars is because we had to use the plastic adhesive hooks, and the plastic hook broke off on two of them. I wish we could use the suction cups, but our shower tile doesn’t work with them which is why I didn’t rate the suction. I love how responsive the company is. I contacted them about our plastic hooks, and within an hour they responded and are going to send us replacement hooks for free!!! I would definitely buy the tub cubby again!!
customer_reviews.author: Children's Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Suction fails weekly. Even when applied to freshly cleaned tile that has great suction power ability. Lack of suction may be due to overloading as you can put more things in it than it can hold. The mesh itself will start turning color and start looking ugly fairly fast. Will cause grout to discolor/grow mold behind it as well, or at least it did in our case. We have since removed it and no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this and I'm pretty happy with it. It is easy to put up and holds a good amount of toys/bottles. I love that it comes with extra suction cup hooks, I use them for hanging our loofahs and washcloths. Only con is that one side does occasionally come down and I have to reapply it, not a big deal though. My suggestion would be to make sure you clean the surface of your tile before putting the hook up and don't overload the net with too many heavy toys. It's a great product for the price and it does what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very strong hooks & net
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - it holds my large bottles of shampoo & conditioner... My children don't use bath toys anymore, I use this for my razor & various soaps, etc. Was soooo happy when I realized it was sooo tough & strong, it holds my 32 oz bottles of shampoo & conditioner too!! & so far haven't had to wake up to the sound of any of them crashing to the shower floor... I've had it for at least 3 months now, so I don't have any fear of that happening anymore. In my opinion, great product, shipped promptly, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Herieca

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used the adhesive hooks, after 2 weeks they are on strong and I don’t think they will budge, easy way to store toys and my sons soaps and such. Great price and easy to install, took all of 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: TOP Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I love the Tub Cubby Toy Organizer.I chose the Amazons Choice. Finally all my daughters toys have a space! Easy to install. The Suction Hocks didn't work for our bathroom but the Sticker Hooks were easy to apply. I made a mistake where I placed them and Customer Service promised me to send some new ones for free. Because they are waiting for a shipment of just Sticker Hooks and are not able to send them to me, Customer Service just sent me a whole new Toy Cubby Organizer with Toys. That's what I call Customer Service! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!! My bathtub looks nice and organized. It holds lightweight toys to heavy products like shampoo and body wash. I’m thinking of getting one for my shower. I love that the Tub Cubby comes with options to get a small one to an extra large one which we needed at my house. My kids love cleaning up and putting their bath toys where they go in their bath cubby.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2shopping

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness do I love this product! SO easy to use and stays up REALLY well! Nornally products like this fall off especially since the kids tend to be quick about putting their stuff away or when pulling out their toys which knocks it off the wall - but not with this! This STAYS on the wall! The suction is great but also easy to move if you need to. Theres plenty of space and I just love it. I'm actually going to buy another for our bathroom too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Prine

customer_reviews.title: These do not work. I bought 2 sets of ...
customer_reviews.text: These do not work. I bought 2 sets of them and tried many times over to get them to stick to tile, the tub, the shower wall - ANYTHING. Tried to wet the plastic suckers, tried to do it with them dry. They would stick for maybe a minute and then everything would fall and hit the tub floor. I had foam items in there so I know it wasn't the weight. Just ridiculous and $20 down the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It will do for now. I do wish that it has options to hold the bottom down on the wall as well so that it doesn’t move around but I love the suctions as they hold in place and don’t move no matter how much you pull st them which is what my daughter did
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: Picky shopper- I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was skeptical about it because of price, and I wanted to find the right tub organizer and not have to return. This is a perfect size! 3 smaller compartments and one large compartment. Super easy to install! And it won’t budge! I’ve cleaned my glass shower wall where it is stuck to so many times with cleaning product and the organizer won’t move! I also love the little squeaky rubber duck it comes with. Totally recommend. I am super picky and critical.
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha

customer_reviews.title: net is fine box is ... not good
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not usually one to leave reviews but I gotta say the graphics on the box this thing came in was ... interesting. The child's hair, complexion, and pose is eerily reminiscent of laura ingrahams "wave" to trump a few years ago. I'll just come out and say that the kid looks like he's throwing a nazi salute. I guess I shouldn't be surprised in the world we're living in but jesus it's not even subtle any more. no offense to the kid also the unstickable suction cups come off
customer_reviews.author: Eric B Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: O!
customer_reviews.text: As always I am apprehensive about suction strength and sustainability in the tub and with kids. Only been a week but all is still doing very well. As a grandparent I appreciate having my bathroom/tub under control now (when kids are not here. I actually bought two - and am glad I did. .....lots of toys
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is very fast and easy to install. The hooks seem to work great with a strong suction. I used the reusable hooks instead of the more permanent ones but may switch them out and use the suction cup hooks for loofah's. I'm so glad to get the toys up out of the tub and out the plastic tub we usually store them in that is always in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Main product is 100
customer_reviews.text: The main product is great. It holds all my daughters bath toys, keeps my bathroom organized, and keeps things dry and clean. It’s great and I wish I had bought one sooner. The additional suction hooks are ok. They come of fairly easy so I don’t use them for anything important. But even if they weren’t included, the tub cubby is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  I don't think a bull could pull this off the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions for how to stick it to the wall, the suction cups have a right-side-up and an upside-down. If upside-down they will NOT stay (but they're not supposed to). When right-side-up, I don't think I could pull them off using all my body weight. There is a release you use when you do WANT to get them off. We have a ton of toys, full bottle of shampoo, and full bottle of body wash in there and it doesn't slide down or anything. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Every toddler bathtub needs one!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! It's great it has a holder for the shampoo/bubble bottles. The others were just a net where you had to dig. 😬 I do have one suction cup that comes off, but they include adhesive hooks for more porise tiles, so I need to break those out. Thank you for including 2 ways to hang it up. I was able to clean the tub today without having toys everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Super strong suction, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The suction cups are not your regular things you have to push against the wall. You lower the hook and the thing sucks onto the wall like a leech. There’s nothing to bring them down unless you put the hook back up. I was always annoyed how my previous bath toy organizer would keep coming off the wall, it was a constant battle. This is really solid and strong and fits a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Izabela D.

customer_reviews.title: Practical product with a 5Star Service
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this for our bathroom wall, so our son can keep all his bath toys and bits in one place. the item arrived promptly and well packed, with a rubber ducky that my son fell in love with. The product is great quality and a good sice, easy to install with great suction A+! would highly recommend this. The duck is adorable, my son takes it everywhere, and he even lost it on an outing - and the company (Kristen) sent us another - the team behind this product really cares, and will go above and beyond, so highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty84

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this and have been our favorite after trying other brands. The betting is good quality and holds good amount of toys. I had an issue with the suction cups but after communicating with the company it all got solved pretty quickly. Costumer service is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: antonella

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Even Without Kids
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it took me so long to think of getting this. I don’t have young kids but saw this at a friend’s house and realized it could hold shampoo, conditioner, and the million other things I use in the shower. It has eliminated the need for extra caddies. I used the suction cups and they are super strong. I have 2 extra and use them to hang a towel and robe. I Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Felgran

customer_reviews.title: Quick install great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about a week with no issues. It is so nice to have the bath toys and babies soap/shampoo all in one space. It appears that this will be a durable bath toy organizer. I also like that there is a back up option for the suction peices incase they wear out. Installation was incredible easy and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Shelcg

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the hooks but contacted customer service and was blown away on how fast a resolution was offered and delivered. The cubby itself is amazing! The hooks hold everything in the cubby with ease. Highly reccomend for item and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: ZanyBrainy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little organizer. My daughter and I live in a small apartment with a small bathroom that has next to zero storage. I bought this to contain all the tub toys I bought her for Christmas. It went up easily with the suction cups and looks nice. Currently I’ve only got a few bottles of baby wash in it, but considering the fact that I couldn’t pull the suction cups off (I could scoot them to proper positioning, though) I have no doubt this will hold all her foam letters and squirt toys. Is there a similar product with more pockets I could put all my shampoos and body washes in?? Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manages to hold our mountain of bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the suction cups, and I feel like they'll have no problem at all staying up! The mesh pocket part is separate from the suction cups which is taking my toddlers a few baths to get used to as they keep knocking the mesh part off of the suction cups. Overall it fits a lot of toys and we're happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MJoelle

customer_reviews.title: 10000% recommend
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this! My toddler and baby don’t have a ton of bath toys and we had them just sitting in a whale cup so the toys and cup would get all gross. So far I love this. It comes with two options to hang up. The suction cup hang did just fine but they also come with adhesion ones if the suction won’t work which is awesome that the company does that. Also super cool you can put soap bottles at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Dyess

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups provided are no joke! I had bought waterproof command strips because my tub surround is notorious for not allowing suction cups to adhere, but these are perfect! They’re very sturdy and won’t budge, the organizer seems sturdy too but I expected it to be a bit bigger. Great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I found the product difficult to suction to my bathtub so I returned it. That's when the customer service rep, Kristen, reached out to me. She offered to send me another with the adhesive tabs to try. Then she upgraded to send me a new, complete order including the bath toys! They really want you to be happy with the product and service and have gone out of their way to see that I am happy. You bet the next time I'm in the market for something like this, I will look for their product!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: sticks to wall well, holds a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: The Tub Cubby made a big difference in our son's bathtime routine. Before we got this the toys would end up lying on the tub floor or bathroom floor because they were too big to fit on the shelf. Now they sit neatly in the Tub Cubby. The tub cubby holds almost all our toys (including a big submarine toy) and we've used it 3 times already without any signs it will fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and amazing customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but on top of that they have amazing customer service. I wrote to them with an issue and they responded almost immediately, even though it was a weekend. They have been consistently responsive and helpful. I’m super impressed because I have worked with many amazon vendors and have grown to not expect much in terms of customer service. I would totally recommend this product and company!! Happy bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: Although you can't expect much for the price, this just won't stick with the given suction cups and adhesive pads. You add more than 0.5 lbs to this thing and it starts dragging down. Good news is if you have a wall mounted shower head you can probably get away with tying it to the handles to get by.
customer_reviews.author: Baka

customer_reviews.title: Not mold resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this bet for more than a few months and there’s mold all over the bottom. We kept our babies tub toys in here, so it really bothered me when I found this. We threw it away and will be looking for something else to store bath time toys in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this item works great. The plastic hooks that were meant for it do not work on our shower wall because its too porous. But fortunately the company that makes this sends you 4 sticky hooks for such a situation and they work great. Only needed to use 2 so I have 2 extras as back up for anything else. I accidentally ordered 2 of these and was going to send the other back. But I like it so much and it was relatively low in price so I'm just going to keep it :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kimrey

customer_reviews.title: It works and it sticks!
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned the area first and put the suctions on and it worked great. Holds a fair amount of bath toys and keeps our bathtub clutter-free. I should have bought one sooner but I was afraid they would not stick. Just follow the directions and you're good to go. I have had this for almost 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Many

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first suction cup item I've purchased for bath tub organization that ACTUALLY WORKS! It's been up for 6 months and hasn't fallen once (except when I purposely overfilled it to test the weight). Good amount of storage and handles quite a bit of weight! And, mine came with extra suction cups, so I used those for another toy storage bag that had suction cups that didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Muehlich

customer_reviews.title: From one mom to another
customer_reviews.text: Update 2/20/2020 This keeps falling off the wall and has spots if black mold and other dirty spots. It is not machine washable so i soaked it but it did not come clean I'm so glad i bought this. Now the toys are taking up less space in my bathroom and my son can pull them out on his own and put them away. When i found out it was created by a mom like me i am so glad i was able to support her!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Stooksbury

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be durable;holds toys well
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive strips work well since the suction cups didn’t work for my type of shower. It holds all the babies toys and will definitely serve its purpose. I would recommend this over buying any of the other brands. It seems durable. I just have to let water run over it to make sure it holds up. I’ll update this review if needed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy organizer for the bath
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion on these are wonderful, and I love that you can remove the net but leave the adhesive part there to easy take it off and put it back off for company. I am able to fill it completely up with stuff and the adhesion hasn't budged a bit. I am so happy with this purchase, and am confident that it will stay in place until I'm ready to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it’s worth it, doesn’t stay on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: One of the suction cups keeps falling off. The clear part that adheres to the wall is all wavy, not straight like the other one...I assume this is the problem. I don’t even have anything heavy in it. Just some foam letters & numbers for the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Darling

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product saves me so much space in the bath tub! The kid’s toys fit wonderfully and there’s room for their soap too! I only used two of the four suction hooks provided so I can use the other two for anything else. There’s also four extra hooks in case the suction hooks don’t work with your shower walls. I’m super impressed by that. I can’t say anything about durability but so far, I’m in love!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Hart

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and large enough for all toys
customer_reviews.text: For the price I cannot imagine finding a better bath organizer. It fits all of my toddlers toys and I keep it lower on the wall so he can take out the toys he wants and then can clean up when he's done. In the many months I've had it he's ripped it off the wall only once (which is surprising because he's a hoss). If it were out of his reach there would never be a problem but I'd rather him have access and the ability to clean up too. I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. The suction cups are frustrating and fall down a lot, but I was happy to find adhesive hooks also included. Those have been up for about a month with heavy use. It has definitely made my life easier
customer_reviews.author: Snickle

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I put off getting a toy caddy for so long and now I don’t know why I did. This one is absolutely perfect. It keeps the toys dry and organized and I can put in our baby’s soap and bath brush as well. The regular suction cups didn’t work on our tile but the set with adhesion work great! Our baby likes to pull on the bottom of the caddy and the hooks don’t budge. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Blizza

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of toys and I love the separate pockets. They came with 4 SUPER STRONG suction cups and 4 sticky hooks. We use the 2 suction cups for the organizer and are using the other hooks for our loofas and around our house. :) good deal I’d say. You pull down the hook to stick the suction cups on the wall and pull up to release it so it won’t come off. Very strong
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Is it EVER does stop working, I’d buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE this organizer! My 20 month old loves bath time and playing with his toys and tends to tug really hard getting his toys in and out. And friend, let me tell you that this organizer will not go down without a fight!! It was super easy to install. I haven’t needed to use the adhesive strips yet because the suction cups are so strong. I also didn’t need to scrub the area clean prior to installing or even wet the area for it to stay in place. I put it up the night I got it and it hasn’t moved since. I am very pleased with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good for toys and travel bath kit
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this bath toy organizer. The suction cups works great even after my toddler rearranges them. The hooks also work well to hold loofahs. My mother in-law asked me to order her one to travel with and loves it too. She said it makes taking her shower supplies with her easier. She does not have to worry about where to set her shampoo, etc and she doesn't have to bend down to reach anything. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good directions
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this but two days so no experience so far, installation was simple with good instructions. Company owner sent request for review before I'd even unboxed it. Recommend they send that request when some amount of time - like 2 months has gone by.
customer_reviews.author: beachspirit

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but the suction cups suck 😒
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome at first hut after a few months the suction slowly started to get worse and worse. And one of the hooks literally just snapped in the middle of the night and i woke up to the whole thing in the tub. And no it wasn’t heavy. There were toys in there but it wasn’t heavy at all. Wish they would send me some new hooks 😔 right now it’s hanging by the little adhesive hooks that come with it, and those little suckers hold it SO much better than the suction hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Anna theisen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Install couldn’t be easier and it has solid suction. Not your normal flimsy suction cups. We have a fiberglass tub in our kids’ bathroom so it’s a smooth surface. Also comes with stick on hooks if needed. Very easy to adjust if needed and plenty of room for toys, soap, shampoo, etc. Fast shipping and great customer service. Great price, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: newmom2011

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups didn't work or hold up the bag no matter that I did, so I used the sticky circles and suctioned the cups the wrong way (according to the directions) but it is the only way it will stay up. LOVE having those you out of the way while I shower! My 1 year old likes to pull her bath toys out herself and put them back in the tub! Lovely accessory!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Simple is genius in momlife
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for my needs. I thought the corner mesh baskets and the cross-tub well styles were cute, but I know my toddler will just go straight for them. This is practical, as it can hang as high or low as you want. It’s also perfect to help dry out the toys each day so they don’t get gross. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ember Knight

customer_reviews.title: Use the adhesive stickers vs. the suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review for this product because I have not hand luck with any type of suctioning holder in my daughter’s bathtub. Only one of the suction cups actually stayed in place; the other would constantly fall. I switched to the adhesive stickers and applied as recommended; so far, so good! I would suggest just starting off with the adhesive stickers instead of getting frustrated with the suction cups. Perfect size for my daughter’s barbies and bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Offenbacker

customer_reviews.title: Great product to keep toys up and clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea..the net is a nice size and made with quality to hold most bath toys but the hooks were tricky to use at first. If you follow the instructions precisely the hooks will stick and hold surprisingly quite a bit of weight. My son really loves to pick up toys and this is a great idea to put toys away and utilizes the compartments very well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all our bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath organizer! It holds up really well. I also like the fact that it comes with extra hooks AND sticky pads for those baths that don't have smooth tiles. I honestly thought it was going to be twice as wide, which would have been a plus, but that's my fault as I didn't pay attention to the dimensions. But for now, it holds all the bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to fit all of our bath toys.
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups are sometimes tricky to get to stick to the wall (it needs to basically be dry, otherwise they'll just slip down the wall), but once you get them stuck, they stay well. I like that it has the top 3 pockets - we use them to put their shampoo/body wash in. It fits all of the toys that we have in our bathtub with room to spare, so it fits our needs
customer_reviews.author: Angela L

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom was moldy in a matter of weeks. I washed but it didn’t remove the mold. I threw it away. It did hold bath toys and had effective suction hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Childress

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a five star product
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for the best bath toy organizer then look no further. I recently purchased this one and it’s been the best investment I’ve done in a long time. The mesh is made with the best durable material that will last a very long time. My entire house whole loves this purchase. The price is super affordable and doesn’t break the bank. Customer care is the best. Kristen is super friendly and puts her customers first. Your opinion do counts and she values your questions and concerns. Please don’t hesitate to buy this product, it worth every penny. I will definitely recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are great!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about the suction cups but these are definitely different and not your ordinary ones. Setup super quickly and you can tell it will hold really well. Super happy with my purchase, i definitely recommend! Great size as well
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t slide!
customer_reviews.text: This bath cubby works great for my daughter’s soap and all of her bath toys. It’s pretty large and holds quite a bit! I used the adhesion hooks instead of the suction cups because they won’t stick to the material we have in our shower, but the sticker hooks work GREAT! They hold up the weight of soap bottles without slipping at all. I am so glad I purchased this to organize our shower. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Did not suction at all
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it will hold a lot of toys but the suction cups don’t work on my tiles and since we’re not staying in this house for long I don’t want to waste the sticky hooks. Unfortunately, I cannot use the bag to properly try it without the suction cup hooks. Maybe after we move I’ll be able to try it and update.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Minkel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mesh net to hold the plethora of bath toys for our child. The suction cups are SUPER powerful and really stay in place. The mesh is a good size and holds big, small, and oddly shaped toys. The smaller compartments are great to hold soap and other smaller items. I'm really happy with this storage!
customer_reviews.author: Adara L. Beamesderfer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy organizer
customer_reviews.text: Stays on well with the suction hooks. My daughter loves filling it. It works great to keep all her toys in one area. Plus I love the 2 extra suction hooks added into the box. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Addy 7318

customer_reviews.title: It okay
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my daughter's toys in the tub as described for the product. I love i can just toss it in the laundry when it needs to be cleaned. I did not like that it didnt come with more of the square adhessive hooks. Seems how the white round ones dont work for our tub more of the others would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tub Cubby Bath Toy Organizer + Baby Rubber Ducky - 14"x20 Mold Resistant Mesh Net Basket - 3 Soap Shampoo Dividers - Keeps Kids Bathtub Games Dry - Suction & Sticker Hooks Shower Caddy Storage Bin Set
feature_bullets: KIDS LOVE TO ORGANIZE THEIR TOYS - THE ORIGINAL TUB CUBBY 14X20" makes organizing bath toys fun! Kids want to put their bath toys away in this multi-pocket bath toy mesh net bag organizer because it will help keep them tidy and most importantly, dry! The Tub Cubby is not only a great product to use in your bathroom, but use it for bedroom, garage or car rides for crayons and coloring books.

UNLIKE OTHER FLIMSY BATHTUB TOY BINS -that rip and fall apart, the Tub Cubby’s quick dry mold resistant mesh net is double stitched and guaranteed for life. Safe and Soft BPA Free Non-Toxic EVA Foam Letters for Kids +3yrs

5 TUB CUBBIES FOR EVERY HOME - BLUE Box Original Size 14x20" + Rubber Ducky - No Foam Letters - PINK Box Original Size with Rubber Ducky +36 ABC 123s - GREEN Box Two 14x20" bins Rubber Ducky & ABC 123 Foam Letters and Numbers - PURPLE Box Really Big 26 x30" Bin Rubber Ducky No Foam Letters - YELLOW Box Really Big 26 x30" Bin and Foam Letters ABC 123s + Rubber Ducky

3800 + 5-STAR VERIFIED REVIEWS - Moms & Dads agree it’s nearly impossible to pull our Lock Tight Suction Hooks off smooth walls, but if you have textured walls our 3M Stickers are guaranteed to stay up! 100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Because we’re parents too we designed and tested the Tub Cubby on our kids first. We expect the best and want the same for you. To resolve any issue you have simply contact CustomerService@ TubCubby and we’ll take good care of you.

NO MORE MOLDY BATH TOYS - Like a toy hammock, the air circulates through the basket keeping your toddlers toys nice and dry. The white mesh net bag easily mounts to any wall or tucks into a corner for maximum storage. BONUS 2x EXTRA HOOKS -for hanging the kids washcloths and organic toys. Big kids like hanging the Tub Cubby on a hanger like a shower caddy, in their RVs, boats and laundry rooms to stay organized.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,201 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
